str2: Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To do not know, be ignorant of, sometimes with the idea of willful ignorance.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
